resources.string: \n\n3. Long press the link for quick actions like copy, share etc.
%1$s requires permission to read logs. Connect your device to a computer with Android platform tools installed and run the following command (needs to be done only once): \n\n%2$s

1. When an update is available, open the app. The link will be displayed shortly(takes few seconds). \n\n2. If an update is available but the link is not displayed, clear data of Google Play Services and repeat 1.
1. When an update is available, open the app and the link should be displayed. \n\n2. The url is read from GMS and not logcat. Hence the link will be displayed until GMS has the link.
